events.name: Somatic Co-Lab
events.description: Facilitators, practitioners, and curious collaborators gather to explore and practice peer-led somatic work including breathwork, circling, and relational exercises.

events.name: Coffee & Connection
events.tagline: Start your day with a break
events.description: Start your day with a break! Enjoy a friendly group discussion with good coffee and great company.
events.price: One drink or snack to support venue

events.name: Sex Positive Friends
events.tagline: Open conversations in a safe space
events.description: An open table to connect in a safe public setting. Topics are fluid but may explore consent, communication, boundaries, relationships, intimacy, pleasure, and navigating desire with openness and curiosity.
events.price: One drink or snack to support venue

events.name: Brews Without Booze
events.tagline: Best NA beer selection in Humboldt
events.description: Enjoy the best selection of non-alcoholic (NA) beers in Humboldt with friends and games!
